item.description:
One of our original meetup members is launching a new business idea with a strong DIY internet marketing effort ~ so take a look and see if it's a good event to bring your kids and strengthen those family bonds while learning a great life skill.  We think you'll have a great time and you can see firsthand what effective internet marketing can do to launch a new business.  Go Caryn!

(btw - This is a PAID event so you must go thru the link below)
***********************************
We invite you and your family to join us at the XperienceU launch program:  'IMPROV FAMILY STYLE'

Through fun family group sketches and comedy techniques, you will learn to think on your feet, work as a team, communicate better and act creatively.

Today's world is all about navigating the unknown and being prepared to handle life's challenges. XperienceU is about learning to live life. On weekend afternoons, you can spend a few hours with your family having fun and creating memories while learning  critical life skills through shared experiences.

How we do it
Through unforgettable experiences that are cool, engaging, special access, hands-on activities for families to participate in together.

Where we do it
We're launching in Boston and all activities are in Metro Boston and suburbs.

What you need to do
Sign up and show up with your family.

XperienceU takes care of the rest!

SIGN UP HERE: http://xperienceulaunch.eventbrite.com/#


More details are available by clicking on the sign up link or visiting our website at www.xperienceu.com. You may share this invitation with your friends, but register quickly as space is limited to ensure an interactive program. Refreshments will be served.


We look forward to you joining us & helping us launch XperienceU.
Thank you for your support.
Caryn S. Saitz, Founder & CEO, and the XperienceU Team
item.name: XperienceU Launch Program
